articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India, the world's third-biggest emitter of greenhouse gases, rejects net zero emissions target - CNN
articles.description: India on Wednesday rejected calls to announce a net zero carbon emissions target and said it was more important for the world to lay out a pathway to reduce such emissions and avert a dangerous rise in global temperatures.
